page.title: 06Church and Chapel
page.content: Nearly every Sunday I go to Chapel, our minister is Rev. Ian Parker who lives in this village. The services are 10.30am and 6.00pm in the evening. We take collection and send it to Barclays Bank. Nearly every Sunday I go to church because the Vicar is my Daddy. Every week there is a serice at 9.45am and 6.30pm and on Tuesday and Thursdays Holy Communion at 10.am. Father Dunstan is our parish priest because I am a Roman Catholic; we have not got a church in Hutton Rudby, we have to travel to Crathorne. Each Tuesday in term time we go to Father Dunstan for half an hour to learn more about our religion and God. Every Tuesday I go to church house at 9am. The man who runs it is Mr. Lickess our vicar. We have been talking about our local monasteries, Mt.Grace Priory, Rievaulx, and Bylands.
